text: Its amazing what our hobbyist urban farmers are capable of achieving. Too bad our land authorities are not releasing more land for such temporary leisure farming. It could to some extent increase our food security. Our bureaucrats should visit more of such community gardens. It is strangely satisfying too see how others manage to grow vegetables and fruits that are so luscious & plump!

It's a nice little neighborhood garden, if you're looking to exercise your green fingers. It's located right by a playground and exercise area, so it really becomes a good community led space for the entire family. Do sign up for classes either at the nearby RC, or look at the banners that they have here on contact details etc.
Best place to witness aqua and hydroponics.  Got vegetables and fruits cultivation too.
Singapore largest private Estate community garden; rent a place growing your own green.

Too bad come at the wrong time
Due to covic 19 they done allow entry,
